category.name: Cleaning Devices
category.path: Household Items\Cleaning Devices

category_idosell.path: Household Items\Cleaning Devices

description.name: Steam Mop with Accessories
description.long_desc:
Steam Mop GEKO Home is a multi-functional steam system that cleans and helps to keep the whole house clean, without the use of chemicals. The device uses ordinary tap water and turns it into heated steam that cleans and disinfects surfaces.


Functions



  • Cleaning sinks, basins, showers, toilets, ovens and microwaves

  • Cleaning hard surfaces of floors and panels and linings using a replaceable microfibre pad

  • Carpet cleaning using a glide applied to the cleaning head

  • Cleaning and sanitizing tile grouts

  • Cleaning and refreshing clothing using a microfibre overlay

  • Washing windows, mirrors and other glass surfaces

  • Scraping grease and dirt from the surface of ovens - using the included round brushes with copper and nylon bristles


Product Features



  • Power 1500W

  • Water tank 350 ml

  • Continous steam working

  • Quickly converts to hand-held

  • Triangle-shaped head design to get into any corner

  • 180 ° swivel head to get into tight spaces and under furniture


Technical Data



  • Power: 1500W

  • Steam Temperature: 90 - 100°C

  • Rated Voltage: 230V

  • Water Container Capacity: 350 ml


Package Includes



  • Steam Mop

  • 70cm Flexible Tube

  • Jet Nozzle

  • 2x Round Brush

  • 2x Microfibre Cloth Pads

  • Carpet Glider

  • Duster

  • Coral Pad for Duster

  • Window Cleaning Brush

  • Window Cleaning Brush

  • Garment Bonnet

  • Measuring Cup


    • Steam Mop

    • Mop Head Attachment

    • 70 cm Flexible Tube

    • Jet Nozzle / Accessories Adapter

    • 2x Microfiber Cloth

    • Towel Sleeve

    • Brass Brush

    • Nylon Brush

    • Carpet Glider

    • Duster with Coral Cloth

    • Window Cleaner with Squeegee

    • Garment Steaming Microfibre Cloth

    • Measuring Cup

  • Carpet cleaning using a glide applied to the cleaning head

description.name: Tube Bender Tool 6.3-10mm
description.long_desc:
Designed for bending copper tubes, aluminium tubes and stainless steel tubes. Ideal for smaller pipe diameter in the automotive heating, air conditioning and ventilation systems, installations, craft and hobby.


Product Features



  • 3 in 1 Pipe Bender

  • For Copper, Aluminium & Stainless Steel Tubes dia.: 6 / 8 / 10 mm

  • Maximum bending angle: 180°

  • Knurled handle
description.short_desc:
Designed for bending copper tubes, aluminium tubes and stainless steel tubes. Ideal for smaller pipe diameter in the automotive heating, air conditioning and ventilation systems, installations, craft and hobby.


Product Features



  • 3 in 1 Pipe Bender

  • For Copper, Aluminium & Stainless Steel Tubes dia.: 6 / 8 / 10 mm

  • Maximum bending angle: 180°

  • Knurled handle

description.name: Magnetic Holder for Impact Wrench and Sockets
description.long_desc:
Magnetic Impact Wrench & Socket Holder. Powerful magnet built in back of the body. PVC coated frame.


Technical Data



  • Dimensions: 400 x 135 x 115 mm

  • Hole Diameter: 75 mm

  • Magnet Diameter: 85 mm

  • Load Capacity: 15 kg

description.name: Mobile Waste oil Drainer
description.long_desc:
Suitable for gravity draining of engine, gearbox and differential oil from all motor vehicles placed on an auto lift or pit.


Product Features



  • 360° swivel collection bowl

  • Mobile waste oil gravity drainer

  • Fitted with 4 wheels, including 2 swivel wheels

  • Oil valve on collection bowl

  • Height adjustable up to 170 cm


Technical Data



  • Collection Bowl Capacity: 10 litre

  • Bowl Size [w x h x d]: 50 x 30 x 15 cm

  • Trolley Base Size: 40 x 42 cm

  • Maximum Tank Height: 68 cm

  • Minimum Height: 110 cm

  • Maximum Height: 170 cm
description.short_desc:
Suitable for gravity draining of engine, gearbox and differential oil from all motor vehicles placed on an auto lift or pit.


Product Features



  • 360° swivel collection bowl

  • Mobile waste oil gravity drainer

  • Fitted with 4 wheels, including 2 swivel wheels

  • Oil valve on collection bowl

  • Height adjustable up to 170 cm


Technical Data



  • Collection Bowl Capacity: 10 litre

  • Bowl Size [w x h x d]: 50 x 30 x 15 cm

  • Trolley Base Size: 40 x 42 cm

  • Maximum Tank Height: 68 cm

  • Minimum Height: 110 cm

  • Maximum Height: 170 cm
description.description:
